name: columnValueMinToBeBetween
displayName: Column Value Min. To Be Between
description: This schema defines the test ColumnValueMinToBeBetween. Test the minimum value in a col is within a range.

parameterDefinition.name: minValueForMinInCol
parameterDefinition.description: Expected minimum value in the column to be greater or equal than

parameterDefinition.name: maxValueForMinInCol
parameterDefinition.description: Expect minimum value in the column to be lower or equal than
